alert.note: Alert for Butte (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 6:07PM MDT until May 07 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 607 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belle Fourche, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Fruitdale and Belle Fourche Reservoir around 625 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Arpan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
